oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Wesley Lester Bandy copyprint photograph
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pvt. Wesley Lester Bandy, Co. E 1st Tenn. Mtd. Inf. Regt., USA, was born on March 7, 1838, in Smith County, Tenn. He was the son of Lewis Bandy. He served in the 1st from Jan. 16, 1864, to Jan. 23, 1865. He then served as 2nd Lt. in Co. D, 8th Tenn. Mtd. Inf., USA, from Feb. 10, 1865, until Aug. 31, 1865. Wesley had seven brothers who also fought in the Civil War, including Pvt. Yancy D. Bandy, Co. K and C, 9th Ky. Inf., USA, who died during the war. Wesley is buried in Underwood Cemetery in Macon County.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Bandy, Wesley Lester
